item.title: The Stammer Of Success
item.description: [whitebox] Editor’s note: Hey guys, Ernie here. Our good pal Andrew Egan is back with an awesome tale about a guy who kicked adversity’s ass. Enjoy. [big]Today in Tedium: On the 14th floor of a midtown Manhattan office building, an organization works diligently to help raise awareness of stuttering. The National Stuttering Association was founded in 1977 to teach the general public about one of Americaâ€™s more common speech impediments.
